file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-18-04-02 - SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR RUBBER TRIM SEAL - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR RUBBER TRIM SEAL - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to replace the rubber trim seal of the main door. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH SIDE- RUBBER TRIM SEAL OF THE MAIN 52-18-04-960-801-A ♦ HINGED MAIN DOOR DOOR - REPLACEMENT EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-18-04 Page 1 of 2 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-18-04-960-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR 2. RUBBER TRIM SEAL OF THE MAIN DOOR - REPLACEMENT A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to replace the rubber trim seal of the main door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR RUBBER TRIM SEAL - AMM TASK 52-18-04-000-801-A/400 REMOVAL SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR RUBBER TRIM SEAL - IN- AMM TASK 52-18-04-400-801-A/400 STALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Main door I. Replacement of the Rubber Trim Seal of the Main Door SUBTASK 960-002-A (1) Remove the rubber trim seal (AMM TASK 52-18-04-000-801-A/400). (2) Discard the rubber trim seal. (3) Install a new rubber trim seal (AMM TASK 52-18-04-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 52-18-04 Page 2 of 2 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
